text: yes, take a look at *export_to_template_context* <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context>, you can add a variable to the tamplate and then use it inside your global header partial to show different content based on that variable
the related_blog_posts tag is what you're looking for <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/creating-a-related-post-listing>
I believe that is what I was looking for!
